body:
I noticed today if one buys for example a gold rank it expires after 3 months.
However, i've had a gold rank more than 3 months so does that mean i get gold rank forever?
body_tagged:
I noticed today if one buys for example a gold rank it expires after 3 months.
However, i've had a gold rank more than 3 months so does that mean i get gold rank forever?
title: Question about the Ranks

replies.body: I'm guessing you bought the Gold rank before the changes were implemented (before the Omega update).
replies.body_tagged: I'm guessing you bought the Gold rank before the changes were implemented (before the Omega update).

replies.body: If you bought a rank before the Omega update, you get to keep that rank forever.
replies.body_tagged: If you bought a rank before the Omega update, you get to keep that rank forever.

replies.body:
[Mini Mod]
